snippet.title: Cris Tales - E3 Announcement Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
Cris Tales is a gorgeous, indie love letter to classic JRPGs with a new perspective. Peer into the past, act in the present, and watch as your choices dynamically change the future -- all on one screen as you play! Beautifully hand-drawn 2D animations bring to life a world where your choices will change both the present and the future across more than 20 hours of gameplay. Coming to PlayStation 4 in 2020.

Learn more about Cris Tales: http://cristalesgame.com
Learn more about Modus: http://modusgames.com

Follow Modus on:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/modusgames 
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/modus_games 
Discord: http://discord.gg/modus
